alert.note: Alert for Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:36PM EDT until June 15 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1115 PM EDT. * At 1036 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crawfordville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, St. Marks, Wakulla, Newport, Shadeville, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Arran, Tully, Plum Orchard, Panacea, Shell Point, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach, Buckhorn, Spring Creek and Liveoak Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
